name: Ice Citadel State Patches
Better Tips

patches.replacement: \1This patch provided by Ducky P.S. I hope youre having a great day mwah <3!\2

name: Spoof Lucky Clover as Potion of Speed

patches.target: <Description>A lucky shamrock that will make enemies drop more and better loot! Lasts 20 minutes.</Description>
patches.replacement: <Description>A potion that boosts speed. Lasts 20 minutes.                      </Description>

name: Spoof Loot Drop Potion as Potion of Speed

patches.target: <Description>A potion that causes enemies to drop more loot! Lasts 30 minutes.</Description>
patches.replacement: <Description>A potion that boosts speed. Lasts 30 minutes.               </Description>

name: Spoof Loot Tier Potion as Potion of Speed

patches.target: <Description>A potion that boosts the tier level of dropped loot. Up to +3 tiers! Lasts 30 minutes.</Description>
patches.replacement: <Description>A potion that boosts speed. Lasts 30 minutes.                      </Description>

name: Spoof Golden Lucky Clover as Potion of Speed

patches.target: <Description>An even luckier shamrock that will make enemies drop more and better loot! Lasts 60 minutes.</Description>
patches.replacement: <Description>A potion that boosts speed. Lasts 60 minutes.                                               </Description>

name: Moonlight Village Pet Stasis Patch
Spoof Crimson Coins x1 as Potion of Speed

patches.target: <Description>Coins once touched by the Hemomancer's hand are now resurfacing across the Realm. Once thought scarce, now they are countless. Coveted by many for the mystery they hold, all are searching - few are digging to unearth what is concealed.</Description>
patches.replacement: <Description>A potion that boosts speed. Lasts 30 minutes.                                                                                                                                           </Description>
